title: You Were The One Who Asked Me That Cringe Question, Right?
body:
You Were The One Who Asked Me That Cringe Question, Right?

"This place is completely different from what I expected," Evan muttered after passing through the portal gate.

After entering the portal gate, Evan found himself standing in a beautiful garden like place. In this enchanting garden, vibrant flowers of every hue were blooming beneath the lush canopies of towering trees. Butterflies were dancing among the flowers, and birds created a melodious symphony as they flitted from branch to branch. Squirrels playfully scamper across the manicured pathways, adding a lively touch to the serene landscape. The air was filled with the sweet fragrance of blossoms, and a serene pond was reflecting the azure sky.

In the middle of the garden, Evan saw the huge Tower of Ascension piercing the sky and looking as if it was reaching into another realm.
